com.launchdarkly.sdk.server.integrations

Class PluginsConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.sdk.server.integrations.PluginsConfigurationBuilder

  • public abstract class PluginsConfigurationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for configuring the SDK's 'plugins'.

    If you want to add plugins, use Components.plugins(), configure accordingly, and pass it to LDConfig.Builder.plugins(PluginsConfigurationBuilder). 

    
     List plugins = getPluginsFunc();
     LDConfig config = new LDConfig.Builder()
         .plugins(
             Components.plugins()
                 .setPlugins(plugins)
         )
         .build();

    Note that this class is abstract; the actual implementation is created by calling Components.plugins().

    • Method Detail

      • setPlugins

        public PluginsConfigurationBuilder setPlugins(java.util.List<Plugin> plugins)
        Sets the provided list of plugins on the configuration. Note that the order of plugins is important and controls the order in which they will be registered. See Plugin for more details.
        Parameters:
        plugins - to be set on the configuration
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        public abstract PluginsConfiguration build()
        Returns:
        the plugins configuration
